description: Enterprise techniques used by hcdLoader, ATT&CK software S0071 v1.1
name: hcdLoader (S0071)

techniques.comment: [hcdLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0071) provides command-line access to the compromised system.(Citation: Dell Lateral Movement)
[hcdLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0071) installs itself as a service for persistence.(Citation: Dell Lateral Movement)(Citation: ThreatStream Evasion Analysis)
